trans-unit.source: Specifies the properties of a <see cref="T:System.Printing.LocalPrintServer" /> object that are initialized when it is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Printing.LocalPrintServer" /> 物件的屬性，該屬性會在建構時進行初始化。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies whether a printer error causes the local print server to beep.
trans-unit.target: 指定印表機錯誤是否導致本機列印伺服器發出嗶聲的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the default priority for the thread that manages port I/0.
trans-unit.target: 指定管理通訊埠 I/0 之執行緒預設優先權的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the default print queue for the local print server.
trans-unit.target: 指定本機列印伺服器之預設列印佇列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the default priority for the scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 指定排程器之預設優先權的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the path to the folder where spool jobs are located as temporary files.
trans-unit.target: 指定多工緩衝處理工作所在之資料夾路徑的屬性 (其型態為暫存檔)。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the kind of event logging that is provided by the local print server.
trans-unit.target: 指定本機列印伺服器所提供之事件記錄類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the major version of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 指定作業系統之主要版本的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the minor version of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 指定作業系統之次要版本的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies whether the client computer or the print server receives notifications that a job is finished.
trans-unit.target: 指定用戶端電腦或列印伺服器是否接收工作已完成之告知的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the priority of the thread that manages port I/O.
trans-unit.target: 指定管理通訊埠 I/O 之執行緒優先權的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies whether users can restart jobs when printer pooling is being used.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者是否可以在印表機集區為使用中時重新啟動工作的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the wait time before jobs can be restarted when printer pooling is being used.
trans-unit.target: 指定在印表機集區為使用中時可以重新啟動工作之前等待時間的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property that specifies the priority of the scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 指定排程器之優先權的屬性。
